title: Missing Installer for Ms Build Tools 15 (Visual Studio 2017)
body:
I need to installer for visual studio build tools 2017 to use setup a new instance of Teamcity, I used the installer that I previously downloaded to setup a different teamcity instance and it installed the build tools no issues. 

I then go to the production teamcity server to install build tools and It installs visual studio build tools 2019 (MS Build 16), I did not realise this had happened and wasted a couple of errors trying lots of remedies online, its when I checked "Uninstall a program" that I noticed it has installed something else. This is not ideal.

Simple resolution: 
Can we have installers under releases for the various versions of build tools?

I was going to using the visual studio 2017 installer (Which gives you the option to install msbuild) but I realised it will also install visual studio taking the installation size to well over 1GB which is undesirable
